name: nostr-ignition
description: A drop-in library to implement an OAuth-like sign up experience for Nostr apps.
author: Jeff Gardner <erskingardner@pm.me>

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --minify && cp src/index.css dist/ && bun run minifyCss
scripts.build:dev: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --sourcemap && cp src/index.css dist/ && bun run minifyCss
scripts.dev: open demo.html && onchange src -ik -- bun run build:dev
scripts.prepare: bun run lint && bun run test && bun run build
